item.title: Bins not collected on 16/12., 22nd December
item.description:
Collections were suspended due to the weather, but we have not been caught up. Our next planned collection is January 4th!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 The Park, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole covers loose: road surface disintegrating, 21st December
item.description:
This is on the road outside WHSmith 192-194 High St Cheltenham. There are 4 manhole covers next to each other with a small strip of tarmac down the middle. The tarmac is all broken up. Every time a car or bus goes over the manhole covers it bangs loudly. Please can you look into this before they collapse. If the manhole covers aren’t Glos Highways responsibility, please can you contact whoever is responsible and let them know about the problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 193-195 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temp traffic lights causing jams, 19th December
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights and seasonal traffic are causing huge backlogs of traffic, The sequencing on the lights seems in appropriate as does the timing of these works right next to the retail park during the busiest time of the year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): C D Bramel Van Centre Manor Road, Swindon Village

item.title: Massive wheelbreakers, 18th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Oxford Cottages A436, Ullenwood
